abstracts.cdata!:
The Afghanistan Public Administration
            Capacity Building Project aims to enhance the performance of
            public sector procurement, financial management, and
            accountability systems which will contribute to a more
            effective, transparent, and accountable state. This Project
            Paper seeks the approval of the Executive Directors to
            introduce the following changes in the Afghanistan, Public
            Administration Capacity Building Project and any
            accompanying amendments to the project's legal
            documents. The proposed changes would include: (i) amending
            the Project Development Objective (PDO) to more accurately
            reflect the original intent of the Government of Afghanistan
            and donors, and to assure a high level of integrity in the
            management of public sector resources; and (ii) reducing the
            scope of training activities intended to contribute to
            building internal Ministry of Finance and line-ministry capacity.
